long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Chrome Browser with League of Legends Themes.

Welcome to the League of Legends New Tab Extension. Immerse yourself in the game with HD wallpapers featuring over 100 champions.

Features:
• HD Wallpapers: Over 100 champion wallpapers to customize your new tab.
• League of Legends Themes: Transform your browser with top-quality wallpapers.
• Integrated Shortcuts: Quick access to leading League of Legends sites.
• Productivity Tools: Includes a timer, clock, Pomodoro timer, games, crypto news, multi-search, and notebook.
• Customizable: Upload personalized wallpapers for a unique experience.

Benefits:
• Enhanced Productivity: Tools designed for studying, working, and planning.
• Efficient Browsing: Direct access to essential League of Legends resources.
• Personalized Experience: Tailor your browser with custom wallpapers.
• Install the League of Legends New Tab Extension today to boost your productivity while enjoying your favorite game.
